name: AC Drain Wiz 1.0
description: The original AC Drain Wiz model is a permanently installed drain line maintenance solution designed for proactive cleaning and fast technician access. It sets the foundation for the product line with a simple, tool-free setup and clear visibility into system performance.
shortDescription: Original model with full-size access and visibility for general residential AC systems.
features: Proactively clears clogs before they back up
Reduces liability and water damage risk
iccCompliance: IMC 307.2.2 - Drain Pipe Materials and Installation

name: AC Drain Wiz Mini
description: The AC Drain Wiz Mini is a smaller, more compact version of the original model designed to fit tighter installation environments, such as high-efficiency units or residential spaces with limited clearance.
shortDescription: Compact model with 25% smaller footprint for space-constrained installations.
features: Perfect for attics and utility closets
iccCompliance: IMC 307.2.2 - Drain Pipe Materials and Installation

name: AC Drain Wiz Sensor
description: The AC Drain Wiz Sensor is a smart monitoring accessory that detects water levels or clogs and can trigger alerts before an overflow happens. It integrates with existing AC Drain Wiz installations to create a fail-safe monitoring system.
shortDescription: Smart monitoring accessory with water level detection and alert capabilities.
features: Early warning system for rising water levels
Easy integration with existing AC Drain Wiz
iccCompliance: IMC 307.2.2 - Drain Pipe Materials and Installation
